snippet: John Kinnucan, a research analyst who waged a campaign against the government officials investigating him over insider trading, had leaked information about technology companies to hedge funds.
abstract: John Kinnucan, a research analyst who waged a campaign against the government officials investigating him over insider trading, had leaked information about technology companies to hedge funds.

headline.main: Analyst Sentenced to 4 Years in a Turbulent Insider Case
headline.print_headline: Analyst Sentenced to 4 Years In a Turbulent Insider Case
